Name: ID
Description: A well-known value 124.  Uniquely identifies this as a SunSpec Basic Storage Controls Model

Name: L
Description: Length of Basic Storage Controls

Name: WchaMax
Description: Setpoint for maximum charge. Additional Fronius description: Reference Value for maximum Charge and Discharge. Multiply this value by InWRte to define maximum charging and OutWRte to define maximum discharging. Every rate between this two limits is allowed. Note that  InWRte and OutWRte can be negative to define ranges for charging and discharging only.

Name: WchaGra
Description: Setpoint for maximum charging rate. Default is MaxChaRte.

Name: WdisChaGra
Description: Setpoint for maximum discharge rate. Default is MaxDisChaRte.

Name: StorCtl_Mod
Description: Activate hold/discharge/charge storage control mode. Bitfield value. Additional Fronius description: Active hold/discharge/charge storage control mode. Set the charge field to enable charging and the discharge field to enable discharging. Bitfield value.

Name: VAChaMax
Description: Setpoint for maximum charging VA.

Name: MinRsvPct
Description: Setpoint for minimum reserve for storage as a percentage of the nominal maximum storage.

Name: ChaState
Description: Currently available energy as a percent of the capacity rating.

Name: StorAval
Description: State of charge (ChaState) minus storage reserve (MinRsvPct) times capacity rating (AhrRtg).

Name: InBatV
Description: Internal battery voltage.

Name: ChaSt
Description: Charge status of storage device. Enumerated value.
Range of values: 1: OFF 2: EMPTY 3: DISCHAGING 4: CHARGING 5: FULL 6: HOLDING 7: TESTING

Name: OutWRte
Description: Percent of max discharge rate. Additional Fronius description: Defines maximum Discharge rate. If not used than the default is 100 and wChaMax defines max. Discharge rate. See wChaMax for details.

Name: InWRte
Description: Percent of max charging rate. Additional Fronius description: Defines maximum Charge rate. If not used than the default is 100 and wChaMax defines max. Charge rate. See wChaMax for details.

Name: InOutWRte_WinTms
Description: Time window for charge/discharge rate change.

Name: InOutWRte_RvrtTms
Description: Timeout period for charge/discharge rate.

Name: InOutWRte_RmpTms
Description: Ramp time for moving from current setpoint to new setpoint.

Name: ChaGriSet
Description: Setpoint to enable/disable charging from grid
Range of values: 0: PV (Charging from grid disabled) 1: GRID (Charging from grid enabled)

Name: WchaMax_SF
Description: Scale factor for maximum charge.

Name: WchaDisChaGra_SF
Description: Scale factor for maximum charge and discharge rate.

Name: VAChaMax_SF
Description: Scale factor for maximum charging VA.

Name: MinRsvPct_SF
Description: Scale factor for minimum reserve percentage.

Name: ChaState_SF
Description: Scale factor for available energy percent.

Name: StorAval_SF
Description: Scale factor for state of charge.

Name: InBatV_SF
Description: Scale factor for battery voltage.

Name: InOutWRte_SF
Description: Scale factor for percent charge/discharge rate.
